about_the_game:
Stylized Visuals and Soundtrack: Experience beautifully crafted scale model-style visuals and a relaxing, atmospheric soundtrack.

Engaging Combat and Challenges: Battle menacing enemies, overcome dangerous obstacles, and escape deadly traps.

Intricate Puzzles: Tackle challenging puzzles that test your assassination skills and strategic thinking.

Secretive Environments: Explore environments filled with secret passageways and off-limit areas, adding depth and intrigue to your missions.

Versatile Tools: Utilize various tools including distractions, disguises, hiding spots, traps, portals, and rifles to outsmart your enemies.

Diverse Enemy Types: Confront enemy types with unique and deadly behaviors.

Collectibles and Customization: Collect relics and unlock new outfits for Uhilant, adding a layer of personalization to your gameplay.

Multiple Approaches: Complete each level in various ways—choose to be silent and stealthy or forceful and aggressive. Aim to collect the elusive backpack or finish within a specific number of moves.

Expansive Levels: Enjoy over 70 levels that experiment with the game’s mechanics in numerous ways, challenging you to understand and manipulate the rules to your advantage.

Character Story: Discover the story of the Uhilant character through the items he carries, adding narrative depth to your journey.

name: UHILANT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i7 or faster
  • Graphics: GeForce 2060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i7 or faster
  • Graphics: GeForce 4000 series
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Cozy, turn-based puzzle game set in a dystopian land overshadowed by a long war. You've made the bold choice to survive instead of becoming cannon fodder. Now You are - "The Uhilant", war dodger. Immerse yourself in this charming adventure, where every move brings you closer to freedom
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
